name: A Squirrelly Winter
description:
A Secret Santa Jam entry, made just for Rinari. I decided to enter this in the Winter Game Jam and give it a winter theme. I hope all who play enjoy it. Happy Holidays!

The game is unfinished, and the Credits must be updated. I will do that as soon as I can.

The goal is to collect acorns and get home, press X to eat an acorn for a speed boost and regain some health.

Credits
